PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_RoadDesignCriteriaCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Road design criteria that may be attached to road parts.

PropertyDef.Name: Crossfall
PropertyDef.Definition: Specifies the nominal crossfall as a ratio measure (slope) at the location of the event.

PropertyDef.Name: DesignSpeed
PropertyDef.Definition:
Speed selected in designing a new road or in modernizing, strengthening or rehabilitating an existing road section, to determine the various geometric design features of the carriageway that allow a car to travel safely at that speed, under normal road surface and weather conditions.
>NOTE  Definition according to PIARC. > >NOTE  The design speed is not constant, but may vary depending on the conditions of relief (plain, hill, mountain).

PropertyDef.Name: DesignTrafficVolume
PropertyDef.Definition: The traffic volume used for planning and design purposes specified as the number of vehicles per day . Typically given as AADT - Average Annual Daily Traffic

PropertyDef.Name: DesignVehicleClass
PropertyDef.Definition: A vehicle designator with content according to local standards.

PropertyDef.Name: LaneWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Standard nominal width of one trough lane.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfThroughLanes
PropertyDef.Definition: The total number of through lanes on the segment. This excludes auxiliary lanes, parking and turning lanes, acceleration/deceleration lanes, toll collection lanes, shoulders etc.

PropertyDef.Name: RoadDesignClass
PropertyDef.Definition: A road design class designator with content according to local standards.
